Content.Text:
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good news, <MYNAME>! A new resident has
moved into town.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've brought him here to introduce him
to you. You can come inside now!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
This individual has come from a far away
land to learn from the development of
our town. His name is <BLUE>Sanjay</BLUE>.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You are <MYNAME>? I have heard much
about you.
<PAGE>
I have been ordered by my master to
observe the rapid development of your
town and learn what I can from it.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
We aren't going to cause any trouble for
you. Fear not. We just want to observe
the way in which the town is growing.
<PAGE>
Please, you need not worry about us.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's the story. He has come to learn
from us, so do whatever you can to help
out.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you both. I will be staying at the
inn, so please let me know if you me for
anything.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
That's all we wanted to say, anyway.
Sorry for coming by so early in the
morning. Keep up the good work!

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Allow me to take my leave.

A new person has come to the town! Let's
hope we become good friends!
<PAGE>
I wonder who his master is, though?
